2+1.sig_info: Juggernaut becomes Unstoppable for 2 to 4 seconds, shrugging off enemy attacks. Once Juggernaut starts moving, nothing can stop him!

PASSIVE: Cyttorak grants Juggernaut 562.16 increased Armor Rating. Additionally, at the beginning of the fight, he becomes Unstoppable and shrugs off all attacks for 3.30 seconds.
WHEN ATTACKED: 11% chance to gain a Fury Buff for 6.50 seconds, granting +42 Attack.
HEAVY ATTACKS: 100% chance to Stagger the Opponent for 8 seconds. The next time a Staggered Opponent triggers a Buff, that Buff and all other Buffs triggered at the same time will be immediately Nullified.
WHILE UNSTOPPABLE: Juggernaut is immune to Stun Debuffs and if the opponent attempts to Stun him, he will instead apply his Heavy Attack Stagger to them.
